Articles.Content:
Hi all,

With apologies to Leonardo da Vinci and Marcus Vitruvius Pollio, and some credit to Proot, Timmon and The Yellow Dart I present the danRosasian Kerbal.

![jFDq3TI.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/jFDq3TI.jpg)

It really was created for my head-canon and in the creation of flags for the AngleCan Space Program several months ago, but I though it would be nice to share. I was inspired to post it up after danRosas' article [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/340-Designing-Valentina-Kerman-a-perfect-badass-Kerbonaut).

Peace.

edit: now with a [blog post descriptor](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/entries/3558-The-Proportional-Kerbal)!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-29T11:56:50Z" title="05/29/2015 11:56  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 29, 2015</time> by theJesuit**
  
added a blog link
